name: You See
description:
It may be confusing at first, but the more you look the more you see.

Look   :  Mouse
Move  :  W A S D

A minimalist experience where every player's act of looking becomes a performance for the next. Designed for an exhibition setting.

🎥   Kalonica   🎥 

This game was commissioned by Bar SK for the 2019 Series. If you’d like to display/install this work in public, please contact them: info@barsk.com.au
